mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jm_bt_sku ( deal_id, product_code, jm_product_id, sku, jm_spu_no, jm_sku_no, upc, cms_size, jm_size, synch_state, creater, created, modified, modifier ) VALUES( #{dealId}, #{productCode}, #{jmProductId}, #{sku}, #{jmSpuNo}, #{jmSkuNo}, #{upc}, #{cmsSize}, #{jmSize}, #{synchState}, #{creater}, #{created}, #{modified}, #{modifier} )
